DOC.brief_summary: Several studies have reported greater weight loss when following high meat-protein diets but limited studies have studied high plant-based protein diets. Thus we aim to investigate the effect of high protein diets in weight management and also to investigate the superior protein source in achieving this effect. In addition, we aim to develop dietary intervention strategies that are realistic and sustainable.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of High Protein Diets in Promoting Weight Loss in Overweight and Obese Subjects.
DOC.detailed_description: Participants will be randomised to either high-protein diets (30% of energy) from animal or plant sources or standard protein diet (15% of energy) weight loss diet for 3 months.
DOC.criteria: Overweight or obese Age 18 and above Both males and females Live in Illawarra Area of Australia Regular medication Smoker Food allergies Presence of disease which may alter metabolic rate
